From the brand

TOOL DAILY

Tool Daily has accumulated abundant manufacturing experience in the past 20 years and possess our own factory.

HOT SELLING PRODUCT

PRODUCTO DE VENTA CALIENTE

HOT SELLING PRODUCT

PRODUCTO DE VENTA CALIENTE

Adjustable Snow Foam Lance with 1/4″ quick connection fitting. Container Capacity: 1 Liter / 0.22 Gallon. Specification: 1000 PSI to 3000 PSI.
EASY to install: fill some soap into the bottle with warm water to get thick foam; Then connect 1/4″ quick connection plug to Pressure Washer Gun or Wand. Finally, adjust the knob on the top to desired foam level and then foam sprayer will disperse thick foam. The knob adjusts the foam dispensing amount and the nozzle adjusts the sprinkle pattern.
Adjustable nozzle for accurate mixing and foam generation. Turn the top knob right (-) to get the thickest mixture, adjust the nozzle to get a proper sprinkle pattern, and let it loose.
5 Nozzle Tips have different angle (0, 15, 25, 40, 65 degree). Choose different nozzle according to the actual need. Such as watering flowers and plants, washing car. They also can be attached to a Quick-Connect Wand for swifter application and more.
Application: ideal for Motorcycle, Car Washing; Roofs, Driveways, Siding washing; floors, Windows washing, it is best product for Detailing Trucks or SUVs.

Read more

Tool Daily: The Great Brand for Pressure Washer Accessory

Tool Daily are committed to developing more efficient and safer pressure washer accessory, helping people reducing the tiredness of spraying and cleaning in the garden. We are known for amazing pressure washer accessory, such as nozzle, wand, gun, coupler, foam cannon.

Feature

  • Universal foam cannon with 1/4″ quick disconnection fits almost all pressure washer.
  • Adjustable foam cannon can mix cleaning fluid with water accurately and generate foam quickly.
  • The bottle can be filled in with 1 Liter cleaning fluid. Spray angle and suction amount of cleaning fluid can be adjusted according to needs.
  • It is used to wash motorcycle, car, roofs, driveways, siding, floors and windows.
  • Working Condition: 1000 PSI to 3000 PSI
  • Max Temperature: 60â / 140â.
  • Bottle Capacity: 1L.
  • PACKAGE INCLUDE
  • 1 X Foam cannon
  • 1 X Red Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (0 Degree)
  • 1 X Yellow Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (15 Degree)
  • 1 X Green Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (25 Degree)
  • 1 X White Stainless Steel Nozzle Tip (40 Degree)
  • 1 X Brass soap nozzle tip (65 Degree)

Read more

How to Install Foam Cannon

Step 1. Fill some soap into the bottle with warm water. The foam cannon’s bottle is graduated and can hold 1000 ml.

Step 2. Connect 1/4″ quick connection plug to pressure washer gun or wand.

Step 3. Adjust the knob to desired foam level and then it disperses thick foam.

(as of Nov 30,2022 11:11:49 UTC – Details)


Carhartt SeatSaver seat covers from Covercraft are the solution to the problem of keeping the seats in your truck or SUV clean and protected from daily use and weekend adventures. Made from durable, duck-weave fabric, these custom-fit seat covers protect your seats from dirt, mud, grime, spills and more. Featuring Rain Defender technology, a durable water repellency finish is added to the fabric to make it highly water resistant. Combine these features with the custom fitment and classic Carhartt styling, you get seat covers that look great and protect your seats from whatever you throw at them.
Compatible vehicle(s): 2017-2018 Chevrolet Silverado 1500, 2019 Chevrolet Silverado 1500 LD (old body style), 2017-2019 Chevrolet Silverado 2500/3500, 2017-2018 GMC Sierra 1500, 2019 GMC Sierra 1500 Limited (old body style), 2017-2019 GMC Sierra 2500/3500
Compatible seat type: 1st row 40/20/40-split bench seat, with adjustable headrests, with fold-down console/cupholder with lid, with storage under center seat, with seat airbags (headrest covers and console cover included)
Custom-patterned to fit your specific vehicle
Classic Duck-Weave Carhartt fabric for durability
Highly water-resistant; Protection from dirt, dust & spills; Machine washable
Ideal for protection from work, hunting, fishing, pets and anything else you can throw at them
Easy installation and removal

Carhartt SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers

Don't let the good looks fool you. These seat covers are tough as nails with heavy-duty, firm-hand Carhartt Duck Weave fabric and triple-stitched main seams. Custom patterned for a perfect fit. Our Carhartt Traditional Fit SeatSavers are designed for heavy-duty protection for work, hunting, fishing, pets, and anything else you throw at them. Not only is the fabric super durable, but it is highly water-resistant to bead away any moisture, spills, or drool from your pups.

Read more

Variety of Seat Seat Styles and Configurations

Custom Patterned Seat Cover

Our Carhartt Seat Covers are custom-patterned for a perfect fit. Enter your Year/Make/Model details and you should see all patterns available for your vehicle.

Make Your Seats Carhartt Tough

Our Carhartt SeatSaver Seat Covers are designed to fit great while being easy on/off seat covers with the same amazing rugged durability you expect from Carhartt.

All Applicable Headrests & Armrests Included

Our Carhartt Seat Covers not only cover the entire backside of the seat on front seat covers we also have rear map pockets built-in so that you don't lose any much-needed storage space.

Read more

Authentic Carhartt Products

Carhartt SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers are the trusted, durable, and dependable design you know and love from Carhartt.

Pillow to Secure Cover

Each seat cover includes a pillow tab to secure the cover. No slipping, sliding or refitting this seat cover thanks to the securing pillow.

Carhartt Styling

Carhartt Traditional Fit SeatSavers are the ideal seat cover when your primary focus is a great fit and superior protection paired with a classic nod to the Carhartt clothing you have come to love.

Carhartt Triple Stitched Seams

These seat covers are tough as nails with heavy-duty, firm-hand Carhartt Duck Weave fabric and triple-stitched main seams. Custom patterned for a perfect fit.

Series E I Office Desk Chair

High-Quality Material: This executive office chair upholstered in high-quality PU leather. Itâs a soft, lustrous, durable and water-proof. Comfortable cushion consis of native sponge and PP cotton, soft and resilient.
Flexible Using Style: You can flip the arms up and do things that can’t be done in other chairs, such as playing guitar or sitting cross-legged. You can also put the chair under the desk for saving space by fliping up the arms.
Adjustable Function: The pneumatic seat height adjustment can meets your different needs.Rocking backwards from 90 to 125 degree can relax you in spare time.degree. 360 degree rotation cushion and rolling swivel caster make this desk chair more flexible and convenient.
Assembly and Security: Certified by BIFMA and weight support up to 330 pounds. Besides, Itâs easy to assembly, and you will not need to prepare additional tools for the assembly.

Product Description

2-in-1 Halloween Christmas Projector Lights Moving Patterns Landscape Waterproof Light

1 * LED Projector Light

1 * Remote Controller (Without Batteries)

16 * Pattern Slides

1 * Power Adapter

1 * Flat Base

IP65 Waterproof & Easy to Install: The Christmas projector light is designed with an IP65 waterproof rating that is suitable for rain or snow weather. Note: Do not soak it in the water directly. It is easy to install, just find the place you want then plug it into the ground, stable and durable.
Indoor & Outdoor Use: Find the place you want then plug it on the ground, fixed on the wall, ceiling, or put it on a flat surface. To better work (get better brightness and visibility)in the dark environment, place the floodlight 10 -15ft from the projection surface. You also can remotely control the color setting.
Wireless Remote & Auto-Timer: The Halloween Christmas projector light comes with a remote controller and timer . You could use the RF wireless remote control to turn on or off the light, set time 2/4 hours, switch the color of the light, moving speed, and flashing speed to create a fantastical and dynamic effect.
Wonderful Holiday Decoration: This Christmas projector light has 16 slides, the best choice to liven up the atmosphere, suitable for Halloween, Christmas, Thanksgiving day, Valentineâs Day, birthday, holidays, etc. Also Great for a gift for family, relatives, friends or colleagues.

Price: $29.95 - $21.48
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:00:46 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Game Story

Let the furious fun begin! Players sprint to arrange a set of 5 blocks so that they match a pattern shown on a card. First player to succeed grabs the card and a new matching race starts. Tensions rise as you scramble to outpace and outsmart your opponents in this ingenious game of perception. So fire-up your neurons and be transported by Match Madness!!

How To Play Match Madness

1. Take a set of five blocks.

2. Flip a pattern card.

3. The first player to recreate the pattern wins!

About Us

FoxMind manufactures and distributes toys and games that offer mind stimulating fun and help develop reasoning skills.

We strive to be known as âthe Smarter Fun companyâ that brings family and friends together for memorable times.

FAST-PACED AND ACTION-PACKED: Players race to solve the puzzle on the card by flipping, rotating and combining identical sets of 5 patterned blocks. Sharp eyes, fast hands and quick minds prevail in this fun-filled pattern-matching frenzy!
PATTERN RECOGNITION AND DEXTERITY: Develop rapid problem-solving abilities and fine motor skills. Match Madness encourages players to think critically, experiment and develop new strategies in order solve the puzzles more quickly.
TWO GAME MODES FOR HIGHER REPLAYABILITY: Choose between Quick-Play (speed) and Total Madness (highest score wins).
AWARD-WINNING FAMILY GAME: Winner of the 2018 Imagination Gaming Family Gold Award and Problem-Solving Gold Award.
SUITABLE FOR AGES 7 AND UP: Can be played in groups of up to 4 players. Match Madness can also be played solo: solve the puzzles at your own pace or try to beat your best times.

Read more

CREATE SCENES AND ROUTINES – Set scenes or put your lights on a schedule, whether at home or away

Connected Max A19 60W Smart LED Bulb

By Cree Lighting

Exceptional smart lighting made simple. Turn on, off or dim your favorite shade of white light for everyday use or get the party started with millions of colors. Control and manage your Cree Lighting Connected Max LED Smart Bulbs from anywhere. Control on the app or with your favorite voice assistant. Set up is fast and easy â pair your bulbs quickly using Bluetooth and then control with WiFi. Enable

âFollow the Sunâ and your lights will gradually shift throughout day to mimic natural sunlight, which can improve your mood, well-being & productivity.

  • CONNECTS TO ALEXA: Be sure to enable the Cree Lighting smart skills in the Alexa app
  • QUICK START: Check out the QuickStart guide below for more information regarding bulb setup
  • SUPPORT: For additional support, check the back of your bulb box or user instructions on packaging

Read more

Read more

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I use Connected Max bulbs on a 5GHz router?

No, Connected Max bulbs must be paired to a 2.4 GHz WiFi network. If you have a multi-band or mesh router, which supports both a both 2.4GHz and 5GHz bands, you can must connect to the 2.4GHz band. For detailed instructions and more help, download the Connected Max Wireless Router Guide.

What does it mean if my bulb is status is “offline” or the bulb is flashing?

A power outage or router service interruption disconnected the bulb from the network. While the bulbs do not need to have constant power, if the bulb does lose any power for a long duration of time, it might need to be reset. To do that, do not remove the bulb from the app. Just select the plus sign on the main menu in the top right-hand corner of the screen. Add the bulbs with the original steps, and all names and schedules given will remain and bring your bulb back to a functional state

Can I use Connected Max bulbs with a standard wall or lamp dimmer?

No, using with a standard wall or lamp dimmer will cause interference and your bulb will not operate as intended. All Connected Max bulbs are dimmable using the Cree Lighting app or with your connected voice assistant.

Can I turn the Connected Max bulb on or off at the light switch?

No, using a wall or lamp switch to turn off the bulb is not recommended. Turning power off at the switch will make the bulb inoperable in the app or with connected voice assistant. Any schedules or automation will not run as scheduled it power is off at the switch. You may also cause compatibility issues or accidentally reset the bulb by switching on and off at the switch.

Can I use the Connected Max bulbs with a smart switches or plug?

No, since the bulb itself has smart technology built in, there is no need to connect to any other smart switch or plug. You may also cause compatibility issues or accidentally reset the bulb by switching on and off at smart switch or plug.

Can the Connected Max bulbs be used outdoors?

Connected Max PAR38 is designed for use outdoors. Its UL wet rating means it can get wet and exposed directly to weather or water. The rest of the Connected Max family is UL Damp Rated, which means it can be used outdoors in a fixture that is not exposed to weather or water (such as carriage light) as long as they’re protected against weather and water contact. Any bulbs used outdoors need to be within range of your WiFi router. A weak WiFi signal may cause delays or interruptions in your controllability.

Quick, Convenient and Hands-Free; the MagicMount is a powerful car phone mount magnetic system for conveniently mounting your smartphone, cell phone or larger smart devices to the dashboard in your vehicle, office, workshop, boat or RV. Lock your cell phone or device in place with this Scosche dash mount car holder featuring a 4-Axis adjustable ball joint neck with lock for optimal viewing at any angle. The integrated cable clips let you neatly connect your cables to the back of the magnetic phone car mount to keep cables from obstructing your view. Its cradle-free design eliminates the need to tighten around your device, just hover your phone magnet near the phone magnetic mount surface and it instantly locks securely in place. These powerful N50 neodymium magnets are very strong magnetic car phone mounts and are still 100% safe for modern smartphones and devices. The low-profile mount safely attaches to your dashboard using the automotive grade base to ensure optimal holding power. Compliment your cell phone automobile accessories with this car phone holder.
Magnetic Phone Holder – Comes with powerful Rare-Earth neodymium phone magnets that provide a secure grip to your iPhone, Android or Tablet. 100% mobile device safe. Simply stick the car mount magnet to the back of your phone case for a secure magnet hold.
Optimal Viewing – With 4-axis, 360-degree adjustable head and enhanced soft touch rubber lock-nut, this magnetic car mount allows viewing from any angle. Provides a great hands free experience.
Convenient Design – Integrated cable clip secures the charging cable to our car cell phone holder for a clean mount. The cradle-free design permits safe, easy one-handed use and access to all controls and ports.
Dashboard Accessories Included – phone mount, MagicPlates, protective film and user manual
Buy with Confidence – Backed by Scoscheâs Lifetime Tech Support and 3-year Warranty

The heat resistant automotive grade mounting base will safely secure a Smartphone in your car, home or office
